contentrichtext.text: {{Expand French|date=December 2008|Le Breuil-en-Bessin}} {{Infobox French commune |name = Le Breuil-en-Bessin |image = Eglise du Breuil-en-bessin.JPG |region = Basse-Normandie |department = Calvados |arrondissement = Bayeux |canton = Trévières |INSEE = 14103 |postal code = 14330 |mayor = Gilbert Lefrançois |term = 2008–2014 |intercommunality = Balleroy Le Molay-Littry |longitude = -0.857 |latitude = 49.2558 |elevation m = 20 |elevation min m = 15 |elevation max m = 58 |area km2 = 4.37 |population = 375 |population date = 2008 }} '''Le Breuil-en-Bessin''' is a [[Communes of France|commune]] in the [[Calvados]] [[Departments of France|department]] in the [[Basse-Normandie]] [[Regions of France|region]] in northwestern [[France]]. ==Population== {{Historical populations |align=left |1962|279 |1968|223 |1975|207 |1982|221 |1990|228 |1999|258 |2008|375 }} {{clear-left}} ==See also== *[[Communes of the Calvados department]] ==References== *[http://www.insee.fr/en/home/home_page.asp INSEE] {{reflist}} {{commonscat}} {{Calvados communes}} {{DEFAULTSORT:Breuilenbessin}} [[Category:Communes of Calvados]] {{Calvados-geo-stub}}
